messages.speech:
From a Century Computer

Once you've logged into a Century computer, double-click on the File Explorer (Folder) icon in the black toolbar and select the network (e.g. H Drive) from the Networks locations section of This PC.

From a Personal Computer

Secure access from off-campus sites is a bit more complicated the first time or two, so please follow the steps in this procedure in the Accessing Student Files Off Campus PDF attachment below: 
http://century.custhelp.com/ci/fattach/get/3819/0/filename/Access+Student+Files+off+Campus_Win_10.pdf

For more information on your file saving options, watch Century's Student Videos - Saving Files video: https://mediaspace.minnstate.edu/media/Student+Videos+-+Saving+Files.mp4/0_h5y5k2v9
